name: com.ferdi.gpm
description:
Git Packages Manager is an Editor extension that allow a quick access to a series of existing git unity packages. The list of packages can be edited.

Changelog :

v 1.0.3 [2021.05.09]
Added theTODO List package.

v 1.0.2 [2021.05.06]
Optimisation of the package update listing.

v 1.0.1 [2021.05.06]
Added the VFX Graph package.

v1.0.0 [2021.05.05]
Initial version of Git Packages Manager.
